attributes.action: Redefine methods of address for members, that reflects the lack of honour in modern politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Than in view of recent developments, members of parliament are no longer eligible to use the address 'Right honourable'

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
